comment._content: Nice bit of digging there, always love when there is a little bit more with an old photograph! Thats a very odd contraption she is sitting on.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/int0lerant] It's the dog that startles me every time I look at this one! He blends into her skirt...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: He does too!  (blend into her skirt - the dog I mean)  Obviously taken in the Poole studio since the racket held by the lad is similar to that shown in an earlier photo.  Nice bit of research NLI, it does add to the enjoyment.
